snippet: This week's City Kitchen features a recipe for an Italian-style rabbit stew.
abstract: This week's City Kitchen features a recipe for an Italian-style rabbit stew.
lead_paragraph: For a cold weather meal, a braised rabbit is a fine choice. The recipe in this week's City Kitchen is for an oven-baked version of the classic hunter-style rabbit alla cacciatore. A touch of tomato, some crimini mushrooms and some dried porcini, garlic and rosemary are all you need, plus a splash of wine and chicken stock. The proportions are forgiving, so measurements need not be exact.

headline.main: Braised Rabbit, a Warming Winter Meal
